ygData.subject: Re: An odd Cleric Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, Thank you for all the information, I really do appreciate this.  I ll have to do a little more digging, and if there s anything else you want to add,
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, Thank you for all the information, I really do appreciate this. I'll have
to do a little more digging, and if there's anything else you want to add,
please do so.
one more question, I usually get times to play on the weekend (though I didn't
get a chance to play for about 3 weeks), What is the Latest Server? And have
they said if another new one will be coming on line anytime soon?
Thanks again :)

Evertorn Soul
Level 20 Erudite Cleric on Veeshan
